seniority_level.evidence: Job requires 1-5 years of professional software development experience and does not include a senior title.

job_family.evidence: Title includes "Data Engineer" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, workflows, and data integration.

sub_specialty.evidence: No specific mention of streaming, batch, warehouse, or lakehouse; responsibilities are broadly about data pipelines within Palantir Foundry.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No references to people management, direct reports, or technical lead responsibilities; role is described as an individual contributor.

primary_cloud.evidence: The posting and Pass 1 extraction do not specify any cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.).

secondary_clouds.evidence: No additional cloud providers are referenced in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: The description does not call out streaming or batch processing paradigms.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, dbt, etc.) are mentioned.

storage_layer.evidence: No storage technologies (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) are referenced.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is listed as Berthoud, CO and no remote work option is described, implying work must be within the United States.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is US‑based (Colorado) with no mention of other time zones, suggesting an Americas focus.

relocation_required.evidence: The posting does not mention a relocation package or requirement; it simply states a specific city location.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization is required and there is no mention of OPT/CPT eligibility.

citizenship_required.evidence: Pass 1 extraction lists "US Citizenship or Permanent Residency" as required.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is full‑time permanent employee, implying a W‑2 arrangement.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits list includes unlimited PTO, equity, health insurance, 401(k) options, and many additional perks.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting mentions "growth opportunities" but provides no specific career tracks or titles.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaboration with a Product Owner and other engineers is described, implying informal mentorship.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions, ladders, or advancement paths appears in the posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The job description does not reference internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit mention of IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Must‑have list includes specific Palantir Foundry experience and manufacturing domain knowledge; no nice‑to‑have items are listed.

scope_definition.evidence: Responsibilities are narrowly focused on building applications and data pipelines within Palantir Foundry.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required experience (1‑5 years) aligns with the technical skill set listed; no unrealistic senior‑level expectations are present.
